author: RTÉ News
title: British monarch to praise virus response
description: Britain's Queen Elizabeth will make a rare special address to her country and to the Commonwealth today to urge people to rise to the challenge posed by the coronavirus outbreak.
content:
Britain's Queen Elizabeth will make a rare special address to her country and to the Commonwealth today to urge people to rise to the challenge posed by the coronavirus outbreak.
In extracts of what royal officials said was a "deeply personal" speech, the 93… [+3132 chars]
